Pescadero.title: Pescadero
Pescadero.byline: Pescadero is a peaceful, coastal town of 600 people (2020) on the Peninsula, approximately 45 miles south of San Francisco.

Pescara.title: Pescara
Pescara.byline: Pescara is a city of 120,000 people (2018) in Abruzzo.

Peshawar.title: Peshawar
Peshawar.byline: Peshawar (Pashto: پېښور‎; Urdu: پشاور) is a relatively prosperous frontier city in Pakistan near the Pakistan-Afghan border, which gives it a distinct Afghan flavour.

Peschiera del Garda.title: Peschiera del Garda
Peschiera del Garda.byline: Peschiera del Garda is in Verona Province, by Lake Garda.

Peso da Régua.title: Peso da Régua
Peso da Régua.byline: Peso da Régua is a city of about 17,000 people (2011) in the Trás-os-Montes e Alto Douro region in Northern Portugal.
